body.para: Comment #2 on issue 4801 by jacobly@google.com: Project links are not middle clickable http://code.google.com/p/support/issues/detail?id=4801
The bug doesn't exist in Firefox or IE, but does exist on Chrome 8, the current stable version. I haven't checked Chrome 9.
Chrome promotes new stable versions pretty rapidly, so I'm tempted to punt on this one.
